project_short_description: AWS CDK Boilerplate in python contains all the boilerplate you need to create a standardized AWS CDK Project with unittest and security checks included.
main_aws_account_id: your main AWS account ID i.e. 123456789012
main_aws_region: your main AWS region i.e. eu-central-1
tooling_aws_account_id: your tooling AWS account ID i.e. 123456789012
tooling_aws_region: your tooling AWS region i.e. eu-central-1
dr_aws_account_id: your disaster recovery AWS account ID i.e. 123456789012
dr_aws_region: your disaster recovery AWS region i.e. eu-central-1
